trans-unit.source: Extends design-time behavior for controls that implement the methods of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl"></xref> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: Estende o comportamento de tempo de design para controles que implementam os métodos do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl"> </xref> classe abstrata.

trans-unit.source: The CompositeControlDesigner can be used with other control types that implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: O CompositeControlDesigner pode ser usado com outros tipos de controle que implementam o <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>interface.</xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise CompositeControlDesigner functions similarly to its base class, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, funções de CompositeControlDesigner da mesma forma que sua classe base, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates the child controls of this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Cria os controles desse filho <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The CreateChildControls method is used to recreate the child controls in the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O método CreateChildControls é usado para recriar os controles filho no controle associado.

trans-unit.source: It ensures that the control collection is created before creating the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Isso garante que a coleção de controle é criada antes de criar a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o HTML que é usado para representar o controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the overloads available for this method see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as sobrecargas disponíveis para esse método, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: In this overridden method, the base implementation always creates the child controls on the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Neste método substituído, a implementação base sempre cria os controles filho para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: O HTML que é usado para representar o controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the designer with the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o designer com especificado <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls Initialize to initialize the component for design.
trans-unit.target: Inicializar as chamadas de host de designer para inicializar o componente de design.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation will throw an exception if the associated control does not implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: A implementação base lançará uma exceção se o controle associado não implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>interface.</xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>, which is the control associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>, que é o controle associado a este designer.
